description: This Dart script automates running 'flutter pub get' and 'flutter analyze' commands in a Flutter project directory. It checks for the presence of pubspec.yaml, runs package retrieval, and performs static analysis, outputting logs and handling errors.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main function that manages the workflow to run 'flutter pub get' and 'flutter analyze', including error handling and process execution.
